content: If you hand over the queen or a rook in exchange for your opponent's bishop, knight, or even pawn, you are making a sacrifice, which is almost always, in fact, an investment because you are looking to gain advantageous compensation.
translations: ita:Se rinunci alla donna o a una torre in cambio dell'alfiere, del cavallo o anche del pedone del tuo avversario, stai face
